description: Schema for product add-ons capability (dev.ocp.product.addons@1.0). Defines a list of optional, secondary items that can be attached to a primary product.

id.description: Unique identifier for this add-on (e.g., 'addon_gift_wrap'). Used in the cart via the addOnIds field.

name.description: Display name of the add-on (e.g., 'Gift Wrapping').

description.description: A short description of the add-on, suitable for displaying in a UI.
